resources.string: Check out the official BeanStalk download page to see if your device is supported https://www.androidfilehost.com/?w=devices&uid=23159073880933293
Send request to join the BeanStalk team slack room for discussion and development
Attention BeanStalk devs, please add me to the team Slack room!
Visit BeanStalk Github to view source and activity
Donate any amount to BeanStalk development. You may need to be logged into paypal first before continuing.
Show power menu on secure lock screen
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Enable one tap action to enable or disable mobile data, wifi, and bluetooth
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
QS tiles titles are now visible
QS tiles titles are now gone
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Press on color below to apply
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
SystemUI will be restarted so that selected setting can be applied correctly.
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Change the shortcuts right under the lockscreen clock
Long press to open apps from shortcuts
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing or music is playing
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Adjust the time for when a screenshot is captured
Show an editor window after taking a screenshot in order to do some operations like cropping, saving or sharing it
Enables the navbar to adapt app\'s primary dark color. Restart your desired app to see effect.
Quick settings disabled on lock screen
Disable expanding quick settings and keyguard shortcuts on secure lock screens
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Change the view of the recents screen
Show the clear all button when using recents
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the background of status bar header
Background of recents apps list gets blurred
Blur personalizations are automatically disabled during Keyguard view!

These colors are the ones tinting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose colors in any way you like.
There are three color filters available for: Light backgrounds, Dark backgrounds and Light/Dark backgrounds.
So how are these colors working?? 
 Simple, as the titles say, the Light filter will be used for Lighter backgrounds, Dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light.
These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: NotificationsDrawer and RecentsApps
For better visibility on bright images
Long press on any image to use for static mode
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Allow override of default values with user config
Pulse will be triggered by pick up sensor
Pick up sensor will not be utilized as a trigger
Pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Notifications will be inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Require a double-tap to wake the device on a doze pulse screen
Disable the settings shortcut in the header
Disable the tile running services icon in the header
Disable the tile edit icon in the header
Disable the multi-user switch in the header
Disable the expand indicator in the header
Use slim recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for slim recents
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel
Wired headset if connected and playing music
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Touch status bar to toggle visibility
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Bottom shortcuts hidden on the keyguard
Bottom shortcuts shown on the keyguard
Allow theme apps from unknown sources
When shutdown button is tapped on power menu, add a dialog to confirm shutdown
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen on
Add color filter to application buttons
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show camera shortcut on secure lock screen
